pageContent: Background: To our knowledge, no previous study has examined state-level geographic variability and its predictors in clinical practice patterns to screen for prostate cancer in the United States.

metaData.source:
Knowledge, attitudes, and practices towards prostate cancer screening amongst men living in the southern Italian peninsula: the Prevention and Research in Oncology (PRO) non-profit Foundation experience
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28780740/
